description:
Everything you need to refill and drink efficiently. The control valve lets you adjust the flow of water and a wide opening makes cleaning and drying a snap.

  • All materials are certified food-grade, BPA/PVC/phthalate free and taste-free
  • Folding lock-top is easy to fill and clean
  • Quick Connect Hose allows a fast disconnect for easy refills on the go
  • Patented 135-degree, silicone mouthpiece with flow control valve
  • Universal size fits most packs
name: MEC Hydration Reservoir
